snippet: A Phoenix woman who spent more than 22 years on death row on a conviction of conspiring to murder her 4-year-old son in 1989 had the case against her dismissed on Thursday by the Arizona Court of Appeals....

headline.print_headline: Arizona Court Tosses Case Against Woman in 1989 Son's Killing
headline.main: Arizona Court Tosses Case Against Woman in 1989 Son's Killing

lead_paragraph: A Phoenix woman who spent more than 22 years on death row on a conviction of conspiring to murder her 4-year-old son in 1989 had the case against her dismissed on Thursday by the Arizona Court of Appeals.
